oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A description of the springboks' bones and the |xam names given to them. 1) Date on p.7267v: 4 August 1878, 2) See also !nanna-sse, 3) This story is found in Book VIII-14.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Springbok bones
